statement.p: In 23.81 of the last 21 days it rained. How many days did it not rain? days

solution.p: We recall that a percent as a decimal is part/whole. Here that is \displaystyle\frac{{P}}{{21}}={0.2381}. We solve for P by multiplying by \displaystyle{21}. \displaystyle{P}={0.2381}\cdot{21}={5.0001}. This is the number of days that it rained. We want the non-rainy days which is 21-5.0001=15.9999 We round that as requested to 16.
